statements: SELECT * FROM security_system_maintenance
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date FROM security_system_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT id, system_name, maintenance_description FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine'
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM security_system_maintenance ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, maintenance_type ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, system_name, maintenance_date FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Check' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE maintenance_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_description FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE system_name LIKE 'SEC%' AND LENGTH(maintenance_description) > 50;
SELECT * FROM security_system_maintenance WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SecuritySystems;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM SecuritySystems WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT system_name, last_maintenance_date FROM SecuritySystems WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT system_id, COUNT(maintenance_id) AS total_maintenance FROM MaintenanceHistory GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT system_name, maintenance_date, details FROM SecuritySystems JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON SecuritySystems.system_id = MaintenanceHistory.system_id WHERE maintenance_date < '2021-10-31';
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM SecuritySystems WHERE system_id = 1;
SELECT system_name, installation_date, last_maintenance_date FROM SecuritySystems ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT system_id, system_name, maintenance_date, details FROM SecuritySystems JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON SecuritySystems.system_id = MaintenanceHistory.system_id WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT system_id, system_name, maintenance_date FROM SecuritySystems LEFT JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON SecuritySystems.system_id = MaintenanceHistory.system_id ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;

SELECT system_name, COUNT(system_id) AS num_maintenance FROM SecuritySystems LEFT JOIN MaintenanceHistory ON SecuritySystems.system_id = MaintenanceHistory.system_id GROUP BY system_name HAVING num_maintenance > 2;
SELECT * FROM SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_name, installation_date, location FROM SecuritySystems WHERE warranty_status = TRUE;
SELECT technician_name, technician_email, technician_phone FROM MaintenanceTechnicians;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, cost FROM SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT technician_name, technician_email, technician_phone FROM MaintenanceTechnicians WHERE technician_id = 3;
SELECT system_name, installation_date, location FROM SecuritySystems WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND warranty_status = true;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_type, cost FROM SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory WHERE technician_id = 5 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM SecuritySystems WHERE system_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM security_systems;
SELECT system_id, installation_date, repair_description FROM security_systems ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT maintenance_staff.staff_name, maintenance_staff.staff_position, service_areas.area_name FROM maintenance_staff JOIN service_areas ON maintenance_staff.staff_id = service_areas.supervisor_id;
SELECT repair_id, system_id, repair_date, repair_type, repair_cost FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY repair_date;
SELECT system_id, maintenance_staff_id, maintenance_date FROM security_systems WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT * FROM security_systems;
SELECT system_id, installation_date, repair_description FROM security_systems WHERE maintenance_staff_id = 1;
SELECT staff_name, staff_position FROM maintenance_staff WHERE staff_position = 'Technician';
SELECT repair_date, repair_type, repair_cost FROM repair_history WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT area_name, zip_code, supervisor_id FROM service_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_systems;
SELECT system_id, location FROM security_systems ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, COUNT(*) AS total_repairs FROM repair_records GROUP BY system_id HAVING total_repairs > 1;
SELECT technician_id, technician_name FROM technicians WHERE technician_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM security_systems;
SELECT system_id, location FROM security_systems ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_id, maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%replace%';
SELECT r.system_id, s.location, r.repair_description, r.repair_cost FROM repair_records r JOIN security_systems s ON r.system_id = s.system_id WHERE r.repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY r.repair_cost DESC;
